alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued June 12 at 2:55PM PDT until June 14 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT MONDAY NIGHT TO 8 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 30 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...White Pine County, Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County and South Central Elko County. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 8 PM PDT this evening. For the Frost Advisory, from midnight Monday night to 8 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County
